instruction: Design a food delivery app that allows customers to select cuisine type.
output: The app should allow customers to select their food and view a menu of available cuisine types. Customers should be able to filter and search for cuisine based on ingredients, location, price and options such as vegetarian or vegan. The app should also integrate with payment methods such as credit and debit cards, Paypal or Apple/Google Pay. Finally, customers should receive real-time updates on their order’s progress.
